dialogue.text: The waves in the bed sheet? Surrender. The ability to ride experience without strangling it.

psychological_notes: The bed sheet waves represent the psychological state of allowing rather than controlling. This visual metaphor captures the difference between rigid resistance and fluid adaptation. The architect recognizes this as a teaching about how to be with experience rather than against it.
philosophical_underpinning: True power comes from surrender to the wave rather than fighting the ocean
therapeutic_direction: Learning to ride the waves of experience with grace rather than force
